someone said to me before that it is possible to get Photoshop 7.0 on here, but I need ..WINE, is this right?
probably. wine is used to run windows apps on linux. there's also cedega which is oriented towards games. it's free if you compile it yourself. search cvscedega. wine should be in the repository
no reason not to have both. sometimes one will run something the other doesn't
wine is more for general apps, cedega for games
nonetheless, some general windows apps are more graphical, and will only work in cedega
